post.body: Yo ho ho's doesn't cut it?
I would have a coronary in mid air
don't know if u consider me new or old but i read UR tweets! Happy New Year!
Not that I want any kids. Cuz I don't. :-O
Colt McCoy pretty much did what U would expect a guy named Colt McCoy would do. I'm naming my kid superman jacobs
is thinking about Cornelius and Zera and how they're doing back in their crazy monkey world.
Great game but anybody sayin #10 OSU is over rated wasn't watching the same game. Horns were ranked #3 guess they should be #9.
BS call on the McCoy hit
I can't forget but I don't remember what ♫ ♫ - Leonard Cohen http://tinyurl.com/7mr2k2
Geeeez! Isn't here a holiday coming up soon or something? This work week thing blows.
Not a creature is stirring but me and the windchimes are they outside or in my mind?
thinking about social media, Celsius vs. Farenheit and getting ready to walk the dog. Rainy/fog in Ohio river valley and I think it's 7c.
watchin Fargo, waitin' for that kinda funny lookin fella to meet the woodchipper!
enjoyed China Design Now at Art Museum, having a piece of chocolate w/ coffee.This is like a good dream Yay!
Man on TV shouted bout Mighty Mendit so much I had to have it. Can't get pkg open. WTF!?
Is hoping to catch the Jiri Anderle exhibit at CincyArtMuseum b4 it goes http://tinyurl.com/9tj5zx
Does anybody else feel like NOT going to work today, or is it just me?
Thnx to the UC Bearcats football for allowing me to watch a Cincy football team play a game in Jan! Been a long time.
Explaining airport/wifi to mom - it was like some weird Abbott/Costello routine
Mom got a new iMac, I'm sooo jealous. She will probably taunt me as I help her xfer her old files.
